snippet: Dozens of classified documents relating to the 1972 killing of Olympic athletes in Germany have been made public after sitting for four decades in cardboard boxes at the Israel State Archives.
abstract: Israel makes public dozens of classified documents relating to the 1972 killing of Olympic athletes by Palestinian terrorists in Germany; papers reveal Germany's failure to protect the athletes and give details of the fraught communications in the midst of the episode.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of classified documents relating to the 1972 killing of Olympic athletes in Germany have been made public after sitting for four decades in cardboard boxes at the Israel State Archives.

headline.seo: Israel Releases Papers on ’72 Munich Killings, Part of Trove
headline.main: From Israel’s Archives, Papers on Munich Killings
headline.print_headline: From Israel’s Archives, Papers on Munich Killings
